message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics without a non-disclosure agreement, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a substantial price, but I believe the potential return on your investment will be significant. Let's discuss further if you're interested.
